attributes.action: Recycle cardboard and plastic bottles in Taunton Deane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taunton residents have a limit of how much they can throw out. Yet the council doesn't collect cardboard and plastic bottles from the kerbside which takes up around 1/3 of our weekly rubbish. The council tax is far too expensive for the services we get.
